snippet: The six-month ban for Solo, 35, was her second from the national team in the last two years, and but the termination of her contract could signal the end of her international career....
abstract: United States Soccer terminates goalkeeper Hope Solo's contract and suspends her from women's national team for six months for unsportsmanlike conduct after team's loss to Sweden at 2016 Olympics; incident is latest in long line of embarrassing episodes involving Solo, which includes arrest in 2014 for assault and drunk driving incident in 2015.
lead_paragraph: The six-month ban for Solo, 35, was her second from the national team in the last two years, and but the termination of her contract could signal the end of her international career.

headline.main: U.S. Soccer Suspends Hope Solo and Terminates Her Contract
headline.print_headline: U.S. Team Bars Solo and Ends Her Contract

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Women's National Soccer Team
